title: "Exotic World Homes"
content:
Welcome to Exotic World Homes, your ultimate destination for finding unique and futuristic architecture designs for your dream home. Our website features a wide range of stunning architectural styles inspired by the distant planets and galaxies. 

Whether you are looking for a cozy cottage or a luxurious mansion, our collection has something for everyone. Our team of expert designers has carefully curated each design to ensure that it not only looks beautiful but also provides functionality and comfort.

We understand that building a home is a significant investment, which is why we strive to provide you with the best options at affordable prices. With our easy-to-use platform, you can browse through our extensive collection and filter by style, size, and budget to find the perfect match for your needs.

Join us on this exciting journey to explore the wonders of futuristic architecture and create your own unique living space.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An illustration of a colony on a distant planet, with a mix of futuristic and traditional architecture."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
